mission.name: Mission 1: Trophy

missionstate.description: Your first mission for becoming a recognized trader is to bring the traveling salesman Rashid a Deer Trophy.
You have completed this mission. Talk with Rashid to continue.

mission.name: Mission 2: Delivery

missionstate.description: Your mission is to get the package from Willard the weapon dealer at Edron.
Willard forgot to pick it up from Snake Eye at Outlaw Camp. So he wants you to go and pick it up from Snake Eye.
Take the package just next door.
Now bring back the package to Rashid.
You have completed this mission. Talk with Rashid to continue.

mission.name: Mission 3: Cheese

missionstate.description: Rashid wants you to pick his special order from Miraia in Darashia. But you have to be quick, Scarab cheese can rot really fast in high temperature.
Now quickly bring back the Scarab cheese to Rashid.
You have completed this mission. Talk with Rashid to continue.

mission.name: Mission 4: Vase

missionstate.description: Rashid have ordered a special elven vase from Briasol in Ab'Dendriel. He asks you to buy it from Briasol and bring it back.\nBut you should be carefully, since the vase is very fragile.
Now carefully bring the vase back to Rashid.
You have completed this mission. Talk with Rashid to continue.

mission.name: Mission 5: Make a deal

missionstate.description: This time, Rashid is testing your trading skills to buy a Crimson Sword from Uzgod. But it have to be less than 400 gold coins and the quality has to be perfect.
Now bring the sword back to Rashid.
You have completed this mission. Talk with Rashid to continue.

mission.name: Mission 6: Goldfish

missionstate.description: Rashid wants you to bring him a Goldfish Bowl.
You have completed this mission. Talk with Rashid to continue.

mission.name: Mission 7: Declare

missionstate.description: Rashid has declare you as one of his recognized traders, and now you are able to trade with him anytime..
